SA20vasvvmsu:2: cittamātraṃ bho jinaputrā yad uta traidhātukam iti sūtrāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:3: cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti paryāyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:11: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptir yadi nārthataḥ // 2 //
SA20vasvvmsu:13: yadi vinā rūpādyarthena rūpādivijñaptir utpadyate na rūpādyarthāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:14: kasmāt kvacid deśa utpadyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:15: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid utpadyate na sarvadā /
SA20vasvvmsu:16: taddeśakālapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃtānāniyama utpadyate na kevalam ekasya /
SA20vasvvmsu:18: kasmād yat taimirikaiḥ keśabhramarādi dṛśyate tena keśādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:19: yad annapānavastraviṣāyudhādi svapne dṛśyate tenānnādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:20: gandharvanagareṇāsattvān nagarakriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:21: tasmād asadabhāvāvabhāsane deśakālaniyamaḥ saṃtānāniyamaḥ kṛtyakriyā ca na yujyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:26: svapne vināpy arthena kvacid eva deśe kiṃcid bhramarārāmastrīpurūṣādikaṃ dṛśyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:27: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid dṛśyate na sarvakālam iti siddho vināpy arthena deśakālaniyamaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:37: tulyakarmavipākāvasthā hi pretāḥ sarve 'pi pūyapūrṇāṃ nadīṃ paśyanti naika eva /
SA20vasvvmsu:38: yathā pūyapūrṇām evaṃ mūtrapurīṣādipūrṇāṃ daṇḍāsidharaiś ca puruṣair adhiṣṭhitām ity ādigrahaṇena /
SA20vasvvmsu:39: evaṃ saṃtānāniyamo vijñaptinām asaty apy arthe siddhaḥ //
SA20vasvvmsu:42: yathā svapne dvayasamāpattim antareṇa śukravisargalakṣaṇaḥ svapnopaghātaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:43: evaṃ tāvad anyānyair dṛṣṭāntair deśakālaniyamādicatuṣṭayaṃ siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:50: yathā hi narakeṣu nārakāṇāṃ narakapālādidarśanaṃ deśakālaniyamena siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:52: sarveṣāṃ ca naikasyaiva taiś ca tadbādhanaṃ siddham asatsv api narakapālādiṣu samānasvakarmavipākādhipatyāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:53: tathānyatrāpi sarvam etad deśakālaniyamādicatuṣtayaṃ siddham iti veditavyaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:54: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ narakapālās te ca śvāno vāyasāś ca sattvā neṣyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:58: parasparaṃ yātayatām ime nārakā ime narakapālā iti vyavasthā na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:59: tulyākṛtipramāṇabalānāṃ ca parasparaṃ yātayatāṃ na tathā bhayaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:60: dāhaduḥkhaṃ ca pradīptāyām ayomayyāṃ bhūmāv asahamānāḥ kathaṃ tatra parān yātayeyuḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:63: evaṃ narakeṣu tiryakpretaviśeṣāṇāṃ narakapālādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:64: tiraścāṃ saṃbhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:65: na pretānāṃ yatas tajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // 5 //
SA20vasvvmsu:66: ye hi tiryañcaḥ svarge saṃbhavanti te tadbhājanalokasukhasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā tatra saṃbhūtās tajjaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:67: na caiva narakapālādayo nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:68: tasmān na tiraścāṃ saṃbhavo yukto nāpi pretānāṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:70: nārakāṇāṃ karmabhis tatra bhūtaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti varṇākṛtipramāṇabalaviśiṣṭā ye narakapālādisaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
SA20vasvvmsu:72: yad dvidhāṃ hastavikṣepādikriyāṃ kurvanto dṛśyante bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:73: yathā meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatā āgacchanto gacchanto 'yaḥśālmalīvane ca kaṇṭakā adhomukhībhavanta ūrddhvamukhībhavantaś ceti /
SA20vasvvmsu:75: yadi tatkarmabhis tatra bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavas tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:76: iṣyate pariṇāmaś ca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // 6 //
SA20vasvvmsu:77: vijñānasyaiva tatkarmabhis tathā pariṇāmaḥ kasmān neṣyate kiṃ punar bhūtāni kalpyante //
SA20vasvvmsu:80: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // 7 //
SA20vasvvmsu:81: yena hi karmaṇā nārakāṇāṃ tatra tādṛśo bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kalpyate pariṇāmaś ca tasya karmaṇo vāsanā teṣāṃ vijñānasaṃtānasaṃniviṣṭā nānyatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:82: yatraiva ca vāsanā tatraiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ tādṛśo vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:83: yatra vāsanā nāsti tatra tasyāḥ phalaṃ kalpyata iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:85: yadi vijñānam eva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ syān na rūpādiko 'rthas tadā rūpādyāyatanāstitvaṃ bhagavatā noktaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:89: yathāsti sattva upapāduka ity uktaṃ bhagavatā abhiprāyavaśāc cittasaṃtatyanucchedam āyatyām abhipretya /
SA20vasvvmsu:90: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmās tv ete sahetukāḥ
SA20vasvvmsu:92: evaṃ rūpādyāyatanāstitvam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā taddeśanāvineyajanam adhikṛtyety ābhiprāyikaṃ tad vacanaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:97: rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā vijñapteś cakṣūrūpāyatanatvena (Vvs_6)
SA20vasvvmsu:99_0: evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate
SA20vasvvmsu:99_1: tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā kāyaspraṣṭavyāyatanatvena yathākranaṃ
SA20vasvvmsu:100: evaṃ punar abhiprāyavaśena deśayitvā ko guṇāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:104: na tu kaścid eko draṣṭāsti na yāvan mantety evaṃ viditvā ye pudgalanairātmyadeśanāvineyās te pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:109: vijñaptimātram idaṃ rūpādidharmapratibhāsam utpadyate na tu rūpādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ ko 'py astīti viditvā /
SA20vasvvmsu:110: yadi tarhi sarvathā dharmo nāsti tad api vijñaptimātraṃ nāstīti kathaṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:111: na khalu sarvathā dharmo nāstīty evaṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśo bhavati / api tu /
SA20vasvvmsu:113: yo bālair dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakādiḥ parikalpatas tena kalpitenātmanā teṣāṃ nairātmyaṃ na tv anabhilāpyenātmanā yo buddhānāṃ viṣaya iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:114: evaṃ vijñaptimātrasyāpi vijñaptyantaraparikalpitenātmanā nairātmyapraveśāt vijñaptimātravyavasthāpanayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyapraveśo bhavati na tu tadastitvāpavādāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:115: itarathā hi vijñapter api vijñaptyantaram arthaḥ syād iti vijñaptimātratvaṃ na sidhyetārthavatītvād vijñaptīnāṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:116: kathaṃ punar idaṃ pratyetavyam anenābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā rūpādyāyatanāstitvam uktaṃ na punaḥ santy eva tāni yāni rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayībhavanti iti / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:117: na tad ekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:118: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇur na sidhyati // 11 //
SA20vasvvmsu:120: yat tadrūpādikam āyatanaṃ rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt tad ekaṃ vā syād yathāvayavirūpaṃ kalpyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:123: na tāvad ekaṃ viṣayo bhavaty avayavebhyo 'nyasyāvayavirūpasya kvacid apy agrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:127: yasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati //
SA20vasvvmsu:130: ṣaḍbhyo digbhyaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhir yugapad yoge sati paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā prāpnoti /
SA20vasvvmsu:134: atha ya evaikasya paramāṇor deśaḥ sa eva ṣaṇṇāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:135: tena sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ syāt parasparāvyatirekād iti na kaścit piṇḍo dṛśyaḥ syāt //
SA20vasvvmsu:138: saṃhatās tu parasparaṃ saṃyujyanta iti kāśmīravaibhāṣikās ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:139: yaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghāto na sa tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:143: atha saṃghātā apy anyonyaṃ na saṃyujyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:144: na tarhi paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāt saṃyogo na sidhyatīti vaktavyaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:146: tasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:147: yadi ca paramāṇoḥ saṃyoga iṣyate yadi vā neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:149: anyo hi paramāṇoḥ pūrvadigbhāgo yāvad adhodigbhāga iti digbhāgabhede sati kathaṃ tadātmakasya paramāṇor ekatvaṃ yokṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:151: yady ekaikasya paramāṇor digbhāgabhedo na syād ādityodaye katham anyatra chāyā bhavaty anyatrātapaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:152: na hi tasyānyaḥ pradeśo 'sti yatrātapo na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:153: āvaraṇaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavati paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa yadi digbhāgabhedo neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:154: na hi kaścid api paramāṇoḥ parabhāgo 'sti yatrāgamanād anyenānyasya pratighātaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:155: asati ca pratighāte sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ saṃghātaḥ (Vvs_8)
SA20vasvvmsu:157: kim evaṃ neṣyate piṇḍasya te chāyāvṛtī na paramāṇor iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:158: kiṃ khalu paramāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate yasya te syātāṃ / nety āha /
SA20vasvvmsu:159: anyo na piṇḍaś cen na tasya te // 14 //
SA20vasvvmsu:160: yadi nānyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate na te tasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:161: saṃniveśaparikalpa eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃghāta iti vā //
SA20vasvvmsu:167: yat tac cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayo nīlapītādikam iṣyate kiṃ tad ekaṃ dravyam atha vā tad anekam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:170: ekatve na krameṇetir yugapan na grahāgrahau /
SA20vasvvmsu:171: vicchinnānekavṛttiś ca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // 15 //
SA20vasvvmsu:172: yadi yāvad vicchinnaṃ nānekaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayas tad ekaṃ dravyaṃ kalpyate pṛthivyāṃ krameṇetir na syād gamanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:174: arvāgbhāgasya ca grahaṇaṃ parabhāgasya cāgrahaṇaṃ yugapan na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:175: na hi tasyaiva tadānīṃ grahaṇaṃ cāgrahaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
SA20vasvvmsu:176: vicchinnasya cānekasya hastyaśvādikasyaikatra vṛttir na syād yatraiva hy ekaṃ tatraivāparam iti kathaṃ tayor viccheda iṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:177: kathaṃ vā tad ekaṃ yat prāptaṃ ca tābhyāṃ na ca prāptam antarāle tac chūnyagrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:178: sūkṣmāṇāṃ caudakajantūnāṃ sthūlaiḥ samānarūpāṇām anīkṣaṇaṃ na syād /
SA20vasvvmsu:179: yadi lakṣaṇabhedād eva dravyāntaratvaṃ kalpyate nānyathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:182: tasyāsiddhau rūpādīnāṃ cakṣurādiviṣayatvam asiddham iti siddhaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ bhavatīti //
SA20vasvvmsu:183: pramāṇavaśād astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā nirdhāryate sarveṣāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ gariṣṭam ity asaty arthe katham iyaṃ buddhir bhavati pratyakṣam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:187: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // 16 //
SA20vasvvmsu:188_0: yadā ca sā pratyakṣabuddhir bhavatīdaṃ me pratyakṣam iti tadā na so 'rtho dṛśyate
SA20vasvvmsu:188_1: manovijñānenaiva paricchedāc cakṣurvijñānasya ca tadā niruddhatvād iti kathaṃ tasya
SA20vasvvmsu:190: niruddham evaṃ tad rūpaṃ rasādikaṃ vā //
SA20vasvvmsu:191: nānanubhūtaṃ manovijñānena smaryata ity avaśyam arthānubhavena bhavitavyaṃ tac ca darśanam ity evaṃ tadviṣayasya rūpādeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ mataṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:192: asiddham idam anubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavatīti / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:194: vināpy arthena yathārthābhāsā cakṣurvijñānādikā vijñaptir utpadyate tathoktaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:196: tato hi vijñapteḥ smṛtisaṃprayuktā tatpratibhāsaiva rūpādivikalpikā manovijñaptir utpadyata iti na smṛtyutpādād arthānubhavaḥ sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:197: yadi yathā svapne vijñaptir abhūtārthaviṣayā tathā jāgrato 'pi syāt tathaiva tadabhāvaṃ lokaḥ svayam avagacchet /
SA20vasvvmsu:199: tasmān na svapna ivārthopalabdhiḥ sarvā nirarthikā /
SA20vasvvmsu:202: evaṃ vitathavikalpābhyāsavāsanānidrayā prasupto lokaḥ svapna ivābhūtam arthaṃ paśyan na prabuddhas tadabhāvaṃ yathāvan nāvagacchati /
SA20vasvvmsu:203: yadā tu tatpratipakṣalokottaranirvikalpajñānalābhāt prabuddho bhavati tadā tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānasaṃmukhībhāvād viṣayābhāvaṃ yathāvad avagacchatīti samānam etat //
SA20vasvvmsu:204: yadi svasaṃtānapariṇāmaviśeṣād eva satvānām arthapratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:205: tadā ya eṣa pāpakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkāt sadasaddharmaśravaṇāc ca vijñaptiniyamaḥ sattvānāṃ sa kathaṃ sidhyati asati sadasatsaṃparke taddeśanāyāṃ ca /
SA20vasvvmsu:207: sarveṣāṃ hi sattvānām anyonyavijñaptyādhipatyena mitho vijñapter niyamo bhavati yathāyogaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:209: ataḥ saṃtānāntaravijñaptiviśeṣāt saṃtānāntare vijñaptiviśeṣa utpadyate nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:210: yadi yathā svapne nirarthikā vijñaptir evaṃ jāgrato 'pi syāt kasmāt kuśalākuśalasamudācāro suptāsuptayos tulyaṃ phalam iṣṭāniṣṭam āyatyāṃ na bhavati / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:212: idam atra kāraṇāṃ na tv arthasadbhāvaḥ //
SA20vasvvmsu:213: yadi vijñāptimātram evedaṃ na kasyacit kāyo 'sti na vāk //
SA20vasvvmsu:216: atatkṛte vā tanmaraṇe katham aurabhrikādīnāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena yogo bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:223: tathā paravijñaptiviśeṣādhipatyāt pareṣāṃ jīvitendriyavirodhinī kācid vikriyotpadyate yayā sabhāgasaṃtativicchedākhyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavatīti veditavyaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:226: manodaṇḍasya hi mahāsāvadyatvaṃ sādhayatā bhagavatopālir gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:227: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kena tāni daṇḍakāraṇyāni mātaṅgāraṇyāni kaliṅgāraṇyāni śūnyāni medhyībhūtāni /
SA20vasvvmsu:229: śrutaṃ me bho gautama ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇeti /
SA20vasvvmsu:230: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // 20 //
SA20vasvvmsu:232_0: tadabhiprasannair amānuṣais tadvāsinaḥ sattvā utsāditā na tv ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣān
SA20vasvvmsu:232_1: mṛtā ity evaṃ sati kathaṃ tena karmaṇā manodaṇḍaḥ kāyavāgdaṇḍābhyāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:234: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ paracittavidaḥ kiṃ paracittaṃ jānanty atha na /
SA20vasvvmsu:236: yadi na jānanti kathaṃ paracittavido bhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:243: tathā tadajñānāt tadubhayaṃ na yathārthaṃ vitathapratibhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāprahīṇatvāt //
SA20vasvvmsu:246: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā
SA20vasvvmsu:248: sarvaprakārā tu sā mādṛśaiś cintayituṃ na śakyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:250: kasya punaḥ sā sarvathā gocara ity āha /
SA20vasvvmsu:252: buddhānāṃ hi sā bhagavatāṃ sarvaprakāraṃ gocaraḥ sarvākārasarvajñeyajñānāvighātād iti //
